# Getting started and loading data

What you want to do: 

- Install R Studio and R

- Load data saved in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet (`.xlsx`), comma separated values file (`.csv`), SPSS file (`.sav`), or Google Sheet.

## Install R Studio and R

### Excel

```{r}

library(readxl)

x <- read_xls()
x <- read_xlsx()

```

### CSV

```{r}

x <- read_csv("")

```

### SAV

```{r}

library(haven)

x <- read_sav("")

```

### Google Sheets

```{r}

library(googlesheets)



```
